${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:ChokeTear.NAME: Choke
${ModID}:ChokeTear.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL When you play a card this turn, enemy loses !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Tear Throat
Shifting. NL Deal !D! damage. If this is the first Attack played this turn, deal !evelynntestmod:sd! damage instead.
Shifting. NL Deal !D! damage. If this is the first Attack played this turn, deal !evelynntestmod:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:FlirtWatch.NAME: Flirt
${ModID}:FlirtWatch.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Apply !M! Charm. NL Apply !evelynntestmod:m2! Weak.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Watch from Afar
Shifting. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !evelynntestmod:m2! Vigor.
Shifting. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !evelynntestmod:m2! Vigor.

${ModID}:SlapHarder.NAME: Playful Slap
${ModID}:SlapHarder.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn only.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Harder Slaps
Shifting. NL Deal !evelynntestmod:sd! damage twice.
Shifting. NL Deal !evelynntestmod:sd! damage twice.

${ModID}:StalkStrike.NAME: Stalk
${ModID}:StalkStrike.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Enter Demon Shade.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Strike from Behind
Shifting. Deal !D! damage twice. NL This costs 1 more this combat. Resets to 1 when exiting Demon Shade.
Shifting. Deal !D! damage twice. NL This costs 1 more this combat. Resets to 1 when exiting Demon Shade.

${ModID}:TestShiftCard.NAME: TestShiftCard
${ModID}:TestShiftCard.DESCRIPTION: Shift any number of cards in your hand.

${ModID}:FancyDress.NAME: Fancy Dress
${ModID}:FancyDress.DESCRIPTION: Outfit. NL At the end of the turn, gain !M! Block for each debuffed enemy.

${ModID}:HateSpike.NAME: Hate Spike
${ModID}:HateSpike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EnticeDominate.NAME: Enticing Presence
${ModID}:EnticeDominate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Shifting. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dominating Presence
Innate. Shifting. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Innate. Shifting. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KissSuck.NAME: Sweet Kiss
${ModID}:KissSuck.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Heal enemy for !M!. NL Apply !M! Charm.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Soul Suck
Shifting. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. If Fatal, Heal !M!.
Shifting. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. If Fatal, Heal !M!.

${ModID}:StrutStomp.NAME: Strut
${ModID}:StrutStomp.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When you fully block an attack this turn, apply !M! Charm to the attacker.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heel Stomp
Shifting. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Infatuated or Vulnerable, gain [E] and draw a card.
Shifting. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Infatuated or Vulnerable, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:EveningGloves.NAME: Evening Gloves
${ModID}:EveningGloves.DESCRIPTION: Accessory. NL When you apply Charm, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:GownVeil.NAME: Evening Gown
${ModID}:GownVeil.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. Outfit. NL Add 3 Voids to your draw pile. NL When you draw a status card, gain [E] [E] and draw a card. NL When entering Demonic, becomes Shadow Veil.
${ModID}:GownVeil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shifting. Outfit. NL Add 3 Voids to your draw pile. NL When you draw a status card, gain [E] [E] and draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL When entering Demonic, becomes Shadow Veil.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shadow Veil
Shifting. Outfit. NL Add 3 Voids to your draw pile. NL Exhausting a status card deals !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL When exiting Demonic, becomes Evening Gown.
Shifting. Outfit. NL Add 3 Voids to your draw pile. NL Exhausting a status card deals !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL When exiting Demonic, becomes Evening Gown.

${ModID}:PullHold.NAME: Pull Close
${ModID}:PullHold.DESCRIPTION: Shifting. NL Apply !M! Charm. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Vigor.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hold Down
Shifting. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn only. NL Fetch a random Attack from your draw pile.
Shifting. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn only. NL Fetch an Attack from your draw pile.
